description: Dumps stack traces for a target program to stdout

options.description: PID of a running python program to spy on
options.name: --pid

options.description: Filename of coredump to display python stack traces from
options.name: --core

options.description: Show full Python filenames, instead of shortening to show only the package part
options.name: --full-filenames

options.description: Show local variables for each frame. Passing multiple times (-ll) increases verbosity
options.name: --locals

options.description: Profile subprocesses of the original process
options.name: --subprocesses

options.description: Collect stack traces from native extensions written in Cython, C or C++
options.name: --native

options.description: Don't pause the python process when collecting samples. Setting this option will reduce the performance impact of sampling, but may lead to inaccurate results
options.name: --nonblocking
